location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Walter Sherer, Civil Auditor, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing the account disbursements and vouchers (not present) for the Bushire Residency for December 1811, January and February 1812. It notes that a charge has been made for the monthly allowance previously claimed by Nicholas Hankey Smith.
